title: FT: N172 Old Judge Bill George Bat Ready - PULLED

posts.post_title: FT: N172 Old Judge Bill George Bat Ready - PULLED
posts.post_content:
+++Pulling card for now+++

Not familiar with OJ’s and the thought of collecting them scares the hell outta me. ;)

Looking to trade this for T206’s or E90’s. Will also consider offers.
